name: Alice - Behind the Mirror
description: Over Wonderland glides the shadow of the Jabberwocky, a terrifying fantasy creature! Alice is summoned by the Cheshire Cat to help restore peace and harmony.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
